getPropertiesMap

static java.lang.Object getPropertiesMap(java.lang.Object object, java.lang.Object noNullValues = true, java.lang.Object filter)
Utility method for getting all persistent properties mapped to their values of a domain object. Null values will not be returned when noNullValues is true.
Parameters:
object - A domain object to get the property map of.
noNullValues - When true, does not return null values.
Returns:
The property map of the domain object, or an empty map when the provided object was null.

static java.lang.String makeOrType(java.lang.Object document)
makeOrType Turns the Instruction (without a file) or Stagingfile instance into XML conform the or schema. By convention all document fields are mapped to attributes.

document

readElement

private static java.util.Map readElement(javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamReader xsr)
readElement Determine if this is a complete XML document and contains the expected namespace and main attributes. Skips all elements and looks for a final end of document. If found we return the attributes
Parameters:
xsr
Returns:
@throws Exception
